sentences.en: Am I too overconfident or arrogant? haha!
sentences.cn: 是不是太自傲了? 哈哈!

sentences.en: Andrew's note: a great way of responding to people who are overconfident of their knowledge and abilities.
sentences.cn: 这个口语要素对于回应那些对自己的知识和能力过于自信的人非常有用。

sentences.en: Are you overconfident that you can do the job even though you don't have enough experience?
sentences.cn: 即使在你没有足够经验的情况下，你是否过于自信即？

sentences.en: God warns us never to get cocky and overconfident; that is the recipe for disaster.
sentences.cn: 神警告我们绝不可自高过于自信，那是招致灾难的处方。

sentences.en: Having scored a point, he made the mistake of being overconfident.
sentences.cn: 得分后, 他犯了过分自信的错误.

sentences.en: He proved overconfident on the witness stand, misremembering a key piece of evidence.
sentences.cn: 他在证人席上表现得过于自信，记错了一条重要的证据。

sentences.en: He realized that he'd lost the race only because he had been overconfident, careless and lax.
sentences.cn: 兔子很清楚,失败的原因只是它太有信心 、 粗心大意以及过份散漫.

sentences.en: I will always remember Brittany as that loud, overconfident girl, and a part of that shy, insecure person I used to be will always keep me humble.
sentences.cn: 我会一直记住布里塔尼，那个举止招摇而又张狂自负的女孩。 而曾经腼腆而又不自信的我也会一如既往地保持那份谦卑。

sentences.en: If i become overconfident, i will recall my failures.
sentences.cn: 自高自大时, 我要追寻失败的记忆.

sentences.en: Islamists should be careful not to fall into the trap of feeling overconfident: they must accommodate other trends, even if it means making painful concessions.
sentences.cn: 伊斯兰教徒要小心地避开可能陷入的自负的陷阱：他们必须适应潮流，即使这意味着他们必须做出痛苦的让步。

sentences.en: People who are overconfident tend to neglect their deficiencies.
sentences.cn: 过分自信的人容易忽视自己的不足.

sentences.en: ROGER FEDERER : Well, I'm not overconfident, very confident.
sentences.cn: 我不会过分自信, 但我很自信.

sentences.en: She warned me against being overconfident.
sentences.cn: 她告诫我不要过于自信.

words.tran_cn: 煮得太久的；做得过分的
把…煮得过久；过于劳累；把…做得过度（overdo的过去分词）
把…做得过分；使过于疲劳；对…表演过火；夸张

trans.tran_cn: 过于自信的，自负的，不自量
